header.contactUsTextMessage: Hello! I would like to order your services.
header.description: We take care of your garden with love and dedication.

services.title: Services
services.descriptionOne: Landscape design, design and creation of gardens
services.descriptionFour: Installation of irrigation systems and fertilizer systems
services.descriptionSix: Consultation on landscaping find or make icons for these items for a block on the service website

about.title: About Us
about.textOne: We are a team of professionals who are in love with nature. Our mission is to transform any space into an oasis of harmony and beauty. We have been engaged in landscape design, creating gardens and green areas for more than 10 years.
about.textTwo: We know how to make your garden a place of inspiration, relaxation and tranquility. Our experts take into account every detail - from the composition of the soil to the unique needs of the plants.
about.textThree: We use modern technologies such as automatic watering systems and vertical gardening to keep your garden looking its best all year round. Trust us and we will give you a green corner where nature comes to life!

work.title: How we work
work.textOne: We discuss your wishes, inspect the site and analyze its features (soil, lighting, climate)
work.textTwo: Our designers create a unique plan for your garden or green area, taking into account every detail.
work.textThree: We prepare the site for landscaping: we clean, fertilize the soil and install the necessary systems (watering, drainage).
work.textFour: We plant selected plants, trees, flowers and create landscape elements in accordance with the approved project.
work.textFive: Our experts provide regular maintenance for your garden, including pruning, watering and pest control.
